Name: Route Network Crisis Part I
Description: The Lahai-Roi Route Network Office has issued an alert, and the Outcast activity it mentioned captures your interest…
QuestDesc: The Lahai-Roi Route Network Office has issued an alert, and the Outcast activity it mentioned captures your interest…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Many students take the Observatory-Academy Highway on their way to field practice at the Giant's Gaze. If they run into Outcasts there, it could be dangerous.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should go check the highway, just in case.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What the--?! Someone's already here? We've only just started!

Dialogues.Speaker: Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't panic! We've got the numbers, take 'em together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, thank you! They came out of nowhere. I was scared to death. Thought my days were over!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Didn't you get a message from the Route Network Office? They warned that this place is dangerous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was already on the road by then! The moment I saw that message my palms started sweating, and I got too scared to drive faster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've gotta get going, or I'll be late with the delivery, and they'll yell at me... Ugh, just thinking about it is making me sweat again.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He's really timid... but maybe that's exactly what makes him a good, safe driver.)
